title: Piling Questions for G+1 and G+4

questions.question: The percentage of piles should be tested by static load method as per DM
The percentage of piles should be tested by dynamic test

Type of piles used in case of high water table
Concrete clear cover for piles used

options.A: 2.0D where D is diameter of pile maximum spacing is 2.5D
options.B: 2.5D where D is diameter of pile maximum spacing is 3.5D
options.C: 3.0D where D is diameter of pile maximum spacing is 4.0D
options.D: 3.5D where D is diameter of pile maximum spacing is 4.5D

questions.question: The lapping length used for piles

options.A: 40d where d is diameter of steel bars
options.B: 45d where d is diameter of steel bars
options.C: 50d where d is diameter of steel bars
options.D: 55d where d is diameter of steel bars
